item.title: RPG Cauldron Secret Santicorn 2025
item.description: I signed up for the Secret Santicorn blog post exchange project over on RPG Cauldron, and was assigned a prompt from… Gus L. of All Dead Generations, whose blog I’ve actually read! (It’s an excellent blog, full of well-researched posts speaking from much practical experience, vs. me who wanted an excuse to play with typography.) The Prompt “Give me a nice little location using this map…” (attached file: Copy of Perfume A.
